Title: Unstoppable EP: A Fusion Of Afro-Urban Rooted In Nigeria Groove – Says Ebonny Musik
Summary: Nigerian-born and UK-based artist Ebenezer Olaolu Mabinuori, with the stage name Ebonny Musik, presents his most deliberate and cohesive project . The five-track EP blends Afrobeat with UK urban textures .

Title: Matawalle vows to reclaim Zamfara from PDP
Summary: Minister of State for Defence, Hon. Bello Mohammed Matawalle, has sensitised stakeholders, party leaders and his teeming supporters on why they should revolt against the ruling Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Zamfara State .

Title: Get ready for full-blown strike, ASUU tells FG
Summary: The Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) warned that a full-blown strike may be inevitable due to what it described as the Federal Government’s discouraging approach to resolving the industrial dispute declared by the union .

Title: Bunmi Talabi marks debut with new worship single ‘Oba Nla’
Summary: Bunmi Talabi steps gracefully into the gospel music scene with her debut single, ‘Oba Nla’ A soul-lifting anthem that ushers listeners into a deeper realm of worship . Known for her passionate worship style, heartfelt lyrics, and spiritual lyrics .

Title: IGP posts Dankwara to head police finance
Summary: Mohammed Adamu Dankwara is the new Deputy Inspector-General of Police in charge of the Department of Finance and Administration . The Inspector General of Police, Kayode Egbetokun, has approved the posting of the posting . A statement issued on Friday by the Force Public Relations .

Title: Obiano hale and hearty, says former Commissioner for Information, Adinuba
Summary: Chief Willie Obiano is alive and in good health, contrary rumours circulating on social media suggesting that he had passed away . Obiano hale and hearty, says former Commissioner for Information, Adinuba .

Title: How many matches are left for Nigeria to qualify for 2026 World Cup?
Summary: Nigeria will face DR Congo in a high-stakes World Cup play-off final on Sunday . Nigeria beat Gabon 4-1 in extra time to keep their hopes of reaching the 2026 World Cup alive .

Title: No plan to impeach our speaker – Ondo Assembly leadership
Summary: The leadership of the Ondo state House of Assembly have dismissed the speculation that plans are underway to impeach the speaker Rt Hon Olamide Oladiji .

Title: Trump claims Democrats are pushing an ‘Epstein hoax’
Summary: US President Donald Trump claims pressure to release details of Jeffrey Epstein's alleged sex abuse network is a "hoax" pushed by Democratic opponents . Trump claims Democrats are pushing an ‘Epstein hoax’

Title: FUTA to withdraw certificates of graduates found culpable of misconduct
Summary: Federal University of Technology, Akure (FUTA) has threatened to withdraw the certificate of any of its alumni found culpable of misconduct . FUTA to withdraw certificates of graduates found to have misconduct .
